Class ec.identity.name.IdentityNameRef 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.identity.name.IdentityNameRef
public class IdentityNameRef
extends Object
implements Serializable
An object that represents a mapping between a nick name and an identity in a given IdentityNameTable. As long as someone holds a reference to this object then the mapping is preserved (though it can be explicitly changed, by calling setNickName on the IdentityNameTable).

See Also:
IdentityName, IdentityNameTable, Identity

finalize()
Finalize; queue up actual finalization so it happens in E thread.
getIdentity()
Get identity part of name/identity pair
getName()
Get name part of name/identity pair

getIdentity 
 public SturdyIdentity getIdentity()
Get identity part of name/identity pair

getName 
 public IdentityName getName()
Get name part of name/identity pair

finalize 
 protected void finalize()
Finalize; queue up actual finalization so it happens in E thread. In a slight abuse of the usual pattern we "reallyFinalize" the tracker object, not ourselves. This avoids exposing "reallyFinalize" to the world (it doesn't matter that it's exposed in IdentityNameTracker, because noone outside the package can get at that class)

Overrides:
finalize in class Object
